name: Native, crossplatform apps with Xamarin Forms
description: In this semester exam project I´m working on a native app with my fellow group members, the client being SDU physio department. Along with an interface in Umbraco for the physiotherapists, a cross-platform app is made with Xamarin Forms. The users for this are patients with shoulder problems doing exercises and entering data in the app for the physiotherapist to gather. The data is send to a redCAP database through an API. A database for temp storing is made with SQL.
tools: Xamarin.forms / C# / API / Xaml / Umbraco / SQL
